Category:Books (extra-universe)1410293sv6w69aj2zkqxh9p31y0636huzvfko7540902012-07-24T10:13:03ZOpark 77210608[[Category:Content]]These are books which exist outside of the fictional universe of ''Game of Thrones''. This includes the ''A Song of Ice and Fire'' series of novels, as well as various guidebooks.

For books within the fictional narrative of ''Game of Thrones'', which the characters are aware of, see:  [[:Category:Books]].
